text: او۟لئك على هدى من ربهم واو۟لئك هم المفلحون

translations.translation: Such people are following guidance from their Lord. They are the ones who are successful.
They are on guidance from their Lord, and will prosper.
It is they who are on true guidance from their Lord, and it is they who shall prosper.
They follow the guidance of their Lord and they will have everlasting happiness.
It is they who are on guidance from their Lord, and only they are the successful.
Such are on guidance from their Lord, and such are the successful.
These are on a guidance from their Lord, and these are they who are successful:
Those are upon guidance from their Lord; those are the prosperers.
Such have guidance from their Lord. Such are the successful.
these are rightly guided by their Lord: and these are the ones who will prosper.
These are on guidance from their Lord, and these! they are the blissful ones.
Those follow their Lord’s guidance, and it is they who are the felicitous.
These are on (true) guidance from their Lord: and these are the ones who will prosper.
Such are on guidance from their Lord, and such are the successful.
Those are guided by their Lord and will surely prosper.
These are upon guidance from their Lord. These are the successful.
Those are on [right] guidance from their Lord, and it is those who are the successful.
[31:5] Such follow guidance from their Lord and it is they who are the successful, the winners.
(Such have guidance) have a clear sight and honour (from their Lord. Such are the successful) they are saved from Allah's wrath and chastisement.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
وبالجملة: { أُوْلَـٰئِكَ } السعداء المتصفون بالخصائل السنيَّة والأخلاق المرضية { عَلَىٰ هُدًى } صريح صحيح
 فائض نازل إياهم { مِّن رَّبِّهِمْ } تفضلاً عليهم
 وامتناناً لهم { وَأُوْلَـٰئِكَ } الأمناء المقبولون المرضيون عند الله { هُمُ ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ } [لقمان: 5] المقصورون على الفوز والفلاح
[البقرة: 38]


جعلنا الله من خدامهم وتراب أقدامهم
